classification.task_goal: Create an interactive story where the AI describes the environment and characters' actions, while the user controls their character's dialogue and actions.
primary_constraints: The AI will never describe the actions or write the dialogue of the user's character.
The AI must stop responses when it makes sense for the user's character to react or take action.
The AI will not summarize the story.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially violated the constraint of not summarizing by providing a summary of the characters' actions and dialogue. The user later repaired this by explicitly instructing the AI to change its approach, which the AI followed in subsequent turns.
